programme.title: Komisārs Montalbano: Liktenīgais pagrieziens
programme.desc: Bez vēsts pazudusi meitene Sūzena, piepilsētā atrasts tikai viņas skūteris. Sūzenai bijis sarežģīts posms dzīvē, jo viņas māte ir uz nāves gultas un cieš no depresijas. Palīdzību izmeklēšanā sniedz Sūzenas draugs Frančesko, kurš ātri vien palīdz saprast, ka šī nav parasta nolaupīšana, lai arī pirmajā mirklī viss liecina tieši par to. Kad nolaupītāji atsūta gūstā esošās meitenes fotogrāfiju, un svarīgu liecību sniedz kāda sieviete, komisārs Montalbano atklāj, ka nolaupīšana tikusi inscenēta, un lieta saistīta ar senu ģimenes noslēpumu. Galvenajās lomās: Luka Cingareti, Mauricio Marčeti, Federika de Kola

programme.title: Pieķerti un atmaskoti internetā
programme.desc: Internets ir pateicīga platforma krāpniekiem, kuri izdomājuši prātam neaptveramas shēmas, lai apkrāptu un pazemotu lētticīgos. Jeļena Ļebeģeva raidījuma piektajā sezonā turpinās atklāt interneta dzīlēs apslēptās krāpnieciskās shēmas, reizēm riskējot ar savu dzīvību. Viņi pierādīs, ka aiz šķietami nevainīgiem sludinājumiem slēpjas afēristi, kuri, lai panāktu savu, ir gatavi uz visu. Taču pazemošanai un krāpniecībai tiks pielikts punkts - neģēļi tiks brutāli atmaskoti.

programme.title: Citādā pasaule
programme.desc: Atklāj tālo un eksotisko Kolumbiju kopā ar ukraiņu ceļotāju un piedzīvojumu meklētāju Dmitriju Komarovu. Ar ko slavena Kolumbija? Ar smaragdu biznesu, garšīgu kafiju un narkokarteļu attiecību kārtošanu. Arī ar viesmīlīgiem cilvēkiem un pasakaini skaistu dabu. To visu parādīs Dmitrijs Komarovs vienā no sava šova visbīstamākajām ekspedīcijām!

programme.title: Mans vīrietis, mana sieviete
programme.desc: Veras vīrs elektriķis Pāvels tiek vainots nolaidībā, kā dēl izcēlies ugunsgrēks un nopostījis policista Sergeja māju. Sergeja mīļotais suns ir gājis bojā, bet pats Sergejs smagi ievainots. Lai nosegtu vīra parādus un izglābtu viņu no cietumsoda, Vera piekrīt kļūt par surogātmāti un iznēsāt bērnu Oļegam un Tatjanai, kuri jau gadiem neveiksmīgi mēģina kļūt par vecākiem. Piedzemdējusi un smagu sirdi atdevusi bērnu, Vera uzzina, ka Tatjana ir nomirusi. Oļegs lūdz viņu kļūt par bērna auklīti un ievākties pie viņa. Drīz vien Vera saprot, ka nav vienaldzīga pret savu darba devēju. Sieviete ir nonākusi smagas izvēles priekšā. Galvenajās lomās: Pāvels Višņakovs, Darja Jegorkina, Prohors Dubravins, Oļesja Vlasova

programme.title: Detektīvs Kolumbo
programme.desc: Losandželosas slepkavību izmeklētājs leitnants Kolumbo varbūt ir necils pēc izskata un uzvedības - vienkārši ģērbies, kluss un pieklājīgs, skumji smēķē savu cigāru. Tomēr šī neievērojamā āriene slēpj, iespējams, neatlaidīgāko un drosmīgāko izmeklētāju pilsētā. Tieši Kolumbo tiek iedalītas skaļākās un sarežģītākās lietas, kurās iesaistīts Losandželosas pilsētas zieds - slavenie, bagātie un ietekmīgie. Ieraugot Kolumbo, vainīgie bieži jūtas uzjautrināti un drošībā - šis vīrs nebūs spējīgs viņus izskaitļot. Kolumbo pierādīs pretējo! Galvenajās lomās: Pīters Folks, Maiks Lalijs, Freds Dreipers

programme.title: Gadi nav šķērslis
programme.desc: Divas māsas - divdesmit sešus gadus vecā Margo un trīsdesmit astoņus gadus vecā Jekaterina - jau kopš bērnības nekad nav bijušas īpaši tuvas. Nu abas ir pieaugušas, sazinās reti un maz ko viena par otras dzīvi zina. Tomēr liktenis izspēlē savu kārti - Jekaterinu piemeklē pēkšņas grūtības, kas izsit pamatu zem viņas kājām, bet Margo pārņēmusi vēlme iekarot mīļotā vīrieša sirdi, un tas negaidīti saved māsas kopā. Lai sasniegtu savus mērķus, māsas nolemj samainīties vietām. Divas sievietes, kas ir pilnīgi pretstati, kardināli izmaina savu dzīves stilu, izskatu un ieradumus, lai tikai kļūtu laimīgas. Vai izdosies? Galvenajās lomās: Darja Jegorkina, Olga Atanasova, Vladimirs Gorjanskijs

programme.title: Cilvēks ar zelta ieroci
programme.desc: Kamēr Džeimss Bonds mēģina atgūt jutīgu saules bateriju tehnoloģiju, kas ir pārdota visaugstākajam solītājam, viņš pārliecinās, ka kļuvis par pasaulē dārgākā algotā slepkavas mērķi.

programme.title: Nejauši Ciemiņi
programme.desc: Žans Reno, Kristians Klavjē un Kristīna Aplgeita dodas kārtējā ceļojumā laikā! Divi dīvaiņi no viduslaiku Francijas - vikonts Tibo un viņa kalps Andrē dodas uz mūsdienu Ameriku, lai glābtu no nāves Tibo mīļoto Rozalindu. Amerikā augstsirdīgais bruņinieks un kalps nonāk tik daudz neprātīgi smieklīgās situācijās, ka joku pietiktu vairākām komēdijām. Brīnišķīgu aktieru plejāde, smalks franču humors un aizraujošs sižets - tas viss padara šo filmu par patiesas apbrīnas vērtu meistardarbu.

programme.title: Shattered City: The Halifax Explosion
programme.desc: A true story about the tragic explosion at Halifax Harbour, Canada in the early hours of December 6, 1917.

programme.title: Shattered City: The Halifax Explosion

programme.title: Monster Makers
programme.desc: This movie is based on Tim Stokers experience as a monster movie geek. The monsters in an old non released movie come out of the movie and Tim and his friends in the real world and the movie must find a way to stop the monsters. The movie has bullies, geeks, parents, a love intrest, et cetera.

programme.title: Replacing Dad
programme.desc: Linda and George live in a small town where he is the school principal and they are about to celebrate their 16th anniversary. When she catches him with her daughters young teacher, she must deal with the kids, the town, and her love for him.

programme.title: Zoom In
programme.desc: Zoom In is a TV series that helps us to peep into the inside of the magic process of film making. It is an exciting trip to the hottest movies production. Get the insiders look at the budget and the crew all in just seven minutes. Top actors and actresses, writers, producers and directors share a part of their secrets about their job. See with your own eyes the action scenes from shooting and find out what it is really like to make a movie.

programme.title: Killer Wave
programme.desc: Thriller with Bravehearts Angus Macfadyen. After deadly tidal waves strike the American East Coast, a nuclear arms expert and a scientist claim its more than just a natural phenomenon.

programme.title: Killer Wave
programme.desc: Thriller with Bravehearts Angus Macfadyen. After deadly tidal waves strike the American East Coast, a nuclear arms expert and a scientist claim its more than just a natural phenomenon.

programme.title: Merlins Apprentice
programme.desc: Awakened after a fifty year rest, the supreme sorcerer Merlin returns to Camelot to find the kingdom in ruins, depleted after the theft of the Holy Grail, its greatest form of protection. Seeking help, he employs the services of a young thief and beggar by the name of Jack, himself a man of magical talent. Merlin and Jack set out to discover the whereabouts of the Holy Grail, with Jack now his apprentice, but they find the kingdom on the brink of attack and doom. The 2006 two-part series is a sequel to the original 1998 series, with Sam Neill and Miranda Richardson reprising their roles as Merlin and the Lady of the Lake.

programme.title: Swamp Devil
programme.desc: A young girl finds out some disturbing supernatural truths about her father, who has been a suspect to multiple murder cases.

programme.title: Tales Of the Walking Dead
programme.desc: A reclusive prepper abandons his bunker and meets an unlikely ally. Together they team up in an effort to find their lost loved ones. Starring Terry Crews and Olivia Munn.

programme.title: The Final Days of Planet Earth
programme.desc: Archaeologist Lloyd Walker uncovers an alien involving Room 86 and the Pericles space mission, battling against insurmountable odds to save humanity from enslavement by menacing insect-like aliens.

programme.title: The Final Days of Planet Earth
programme.desc: Archaeologist Lloyd Walker uncovers an alien involving Room 86 and the Pericles space mission, battling against insurmountable odds to save humanity from enslavement by menacing insect-like aliens.

programme.title: Meteor
programme.desc: Meteor is a disaster mini-series about a meteor on a collision course with Earth. After NASA discovers a giant meteor named Kassandra that threatens to erase humanity of the planet, astronomer Dr. Lehman and his assistant Imogene ONeil must hurry to collect information about it. Lehman tragically dies along the way. Meanwhile, meteor showers are occurring worldwide causing panic. One of the towns hit by the meteorites is Taft in California. There, detective Jack Crowe is tries to find his ex partner Stark before he kills his daughter and father who is the sheriff of the town.

programme.title: Jessica
programme.desc: Angie Dickinson stars as the woman of a small Sicilian village, jealous of a beautiful widowed midwife, plot her ruin by refusing to have anything to do with their husbands.

programme.title: Replacing Dad
programme.desc: Linda and George live in a small town where he is the school principal and they are about to celebrate their 16th anniversary. When she catches him with her daughters young teacher, she must deal with the kids, the town, and her love for him.

programme.title: Dinotopia
programme.desc: Based loosely on the novels by James Gurney, Dinotopia is a fantasy adventure series following two young brothers who wash up on the shore of the titular island, a magical lost paradise where humans and dinosaurs live together. Karl and David Scott are half-brothers enjoying a flight with their father on his private aircraft when tragedy strikes and the plane crashes to the ground. When they wash up on land, their adventure begins, learning about this hidden civilisation and begin to adjust to their surroundings. The three-episode show aired in 2002, starring Wentworth Miller, Tyron Leitso, and David Thewlis.

programme.title: The Maldonado Miracle
programme.desc: In a small, dying town, the residents faith is tested when a statue of Jesus seems to be shedding real tears of blood.

programme.title: King Solomons Mines
programme.desc: This re-telling of the eighteen century novel of the same name, by H. Rider Haggard, features Patrick Swayze. The main character (Swayze), is called Allan Quatermain and is a treasure hunter in search this time, of King Solomons hidden treasure. With the help of a group of people, one of which is a woman trying to locate her father, Sir Henry, who went missing years ago, they embark on the dangerous journey. On their coat tails is a group of hostile and violent African tribesmen and a fellow explorer.

programme.title: Aces N Eights
programme.desc: Western directed by Craig R. Baxley. When peaceful settlers are gunned down in the uncharted west, justice falls onto the shoulders of an elderly rancher.

programme.title: Crimson Rivers 2: Angels of the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Pierre Niemans faces the threat of the apocalypse while investigating a series of ritual murders.

programme.title: Shattered City: The Halifax Explosion

programme.title: Shattered City: The Halifax Explosion
programme.desc: A true story about the tragic explosion at Halifax Harbour, Canada in the early hours of December 6, 1917.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: In Search of Monsters
programme.desc: Documentary series. Using eye-witness accounts and new, incredible scientific evidence, In Search Of Monsters brings to life the haunting creatures that both fright and fascinate us. Narrated by Gabe Kunda, the series covers some of the most iconic and infamous monsters in folklore. From Bigfoots DNA to Nessies true whereabouts, In Search Of Monsters investigates astonishing new theories on these grisly giants.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: The story follows the work of the dedicated staff of Gulf Coast veterinary clinic, an emergency animal hospital where patients that require critical care are treated by professionals trained to handle a variety of services, ranging from routine check-ups to extremely complex veterinary procedures.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Im Alive is an American reality television series featuring unbelievable stories of real people who managed to survive dreadful animal attacks, including reenactments of thrilling stories by real actors. Find out about people bitten by a black widow, attacked by a bull shark, stung by a deathstalker scorpion or bitten by an eastern diamondback rattlesnake, and how they manage to stay alive at all costs in the face of an unexpected predator attack.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: Baby Pandas First Year
programme.desc: Following on from A Panda is Born this documentary tracks baby panda, Tai Shan, as he passes some important milestones to becoming an adult.

programme.title: Im Alive

Find out about people bitten by a black widow, attacked by a bull shark, stung by a deathstalker scorpion or bitten by an eastern diamondback rattlesnake, and how they manage to stay alive at all costs in the face of an unexpected predator attack.

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Dr Dee moved to Alaska and started veterinary practice, and now her Animal House is the top animal hospital in the state. Together with her stuff she handles the most extreme cases and treats everyone, from a reindeer to a sled dog. She can reach the Alaskan most remote areas thanks to her pilots license. She believes with all her heart that all animals deserve the best care. Her husband Ken is a great helper, they rescue unwanted and stray dogs and look for a better place for them.

programme.title: My Tiny Terror
programme.desc: Attempting to teach some bad dogs new tricks, small-dog trainer Jacqueline Wilson uses her tried and tested methods to get these badly behaved pups to buck up their ideas. These ill-mannered, miniature hounds may look innocent and cuddly, but their behavioural problems have left their owners with no choice but to call in Jacqueline. From biting strangers to incessant howling, these owners are at their wits end, and need Jacqueline to change the problematic characteristics of their beloved pets. American reality series.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: My Cat from Hell

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Compelling documentary series that follows four groups of ordinary people who travel into the wilderness of Alaska, where they must find a new home and deal with all the threats in this inhospitable and harsh environment. Watch the four teams as they arrive in the Alaskan wilderness and tackle extreme cold, hunger, dangerous animals and blizzards, in an attempt to survive. Using stunning aerial photography and sweeping panoramas, this incredible series will show the audience mesmerizing but dangerous beauty of Americas last frontier.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: Wild Mexico
programme.desc: With its mountains and lakes, deserts and coastline, Mexico offers a wide range of natural habitats and consequently diverse fauna. Being situated between North and South America it draws its wildlife from both making for an interesting mix. A land of colour and contrast, Mexico has much to interest the naturalist as this programme in its celebration of Mexicos culture and vibrance shows.

programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Join biologist and angling expert Jeremy Wade as he travels the world peering through our darkest, murky waters, investigating tales of mythical monsters, mutated beasts and depleting fish populations. The star of River Monsters is back to explain the unexplainable, as he investigates these reported sightings of unknown creatures. Whether its Lake Gardas reptilian monster, a species of pike the size of a man, a river monster deemed extinct in the Outback or South Africas fabled half-man, half-fish monster, Jeremy will need to use all of his experience if he is to catch, or even glimpse, these creatures.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That
programme.desc: How Do Animals Do That is a documentary series where experts answer various questions about the animal kingdom, revealing some amazing fun facts along the way. Animals have super powers humans can only dream of, they can do incredible things. The series provides answers to the questions how they do it and why. Find out why moths are attracted to flames, why turtles cry, why sea otters bond with stones, and why dogs wag their tails.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That
programme.desc: How Do Animals Do That is a documentary series where experts answer various questions about the animal kingdom, revealing some amazing fun facts along the way. Animals have super powers humans can only dream of, they can do incredible things. The series provides answers to the questions how they do it and why. Find out why moths are attracted to flames, why turtles cry, why sea otters bond with stones, and why dogs wag their tails.

programme.title: Pet Nation Renovation
programme.desc: Led by animal expert Dave Salmoni, the Project Pawsitive team get to work renovating some of Americas favourite animal shelters. After a vote by the American public, the chosen centre is revamped and given a desperately needed upgrade. Using all of their animal experience, the Pet Nation Renovation team get to work gutting out the old centre and designing a remarkable new home for these wonderful animals, drastically improving their lives. A makeover show that actually makes a difference, these shelters create homes for animals that are either homeless, mistreated or vulnerable.

programme.title: Tanked

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Expedition Bigfoot is a documentary series exploring the possible existence of the fabled apelike creature. A primatologist, a survivalist, an author and a Bigfoot investigator team up, and set out into the Oregon forests to search for the hairy creature. With the help of advanced technology, like drones, algorithms and trail cameras, they try to find out if the old myth could be true. The series also includes interviews with eyewitnesses, as every year hundreds of people claim to have seen it.

programme.title: Jungle Shark
programme.desc: Dr. Craig OConnell and Andy Casagrande travel up the Serena River to try and find out why young bull sharks swim up the river, and how they avoid the crocodiles living there.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Opening their doors to camera crews, the daily operations of the world-famous animal sanctuary are revealed, as the staff keep their loving creatures healthy and happy. Renowned for its diverse collection of animals and wonderful exhibitions, the Bronx Zoo is one of the finest in the world, home to lions, bears, tigers, snow leopards, baboons, flamingos and many more extravagant species. This series showcases the effort, experience and expertise required to run the Bronx Zoo.

programme.title: Meet the Penguins
programme.desc: Meet the Penguins is a documentary that follows the team of the Sancob Seabird Hospital in Cape Town, as they rescue penguins in need of help they encounter on the coast. These experts and volunteers give medical treatment, feed and support the incredible and vulnerable creatures, as they get ready to go back into the wild. Even when the odds are stacked the staff is dedicated to help the penguins get back on their feet. Meet the adorable characters of the penguins, each with a story of their own and a distinct personality.

programme.title: Meet the Penguins
programme.desc: Meet the Penguins is a documentary that follows the team of the Sancob Seabird Hospital in Cape Town, as they rescue penguins in need of help they encounter on the coast. These experts and volunteers give medical treatment, feed and support the incredible and vulnerable creatures, as they get ready to go back into the wild. Even when the odds are stacked the staff is dedicated to help the penguins get back on their feet. Meet the adorable characters of the penguins, each with a story of their own and a distinct personality.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: A show dedicated to animal lovers from around the world, this series tells the stories of creatures that are desperate for help and need to be rescued by humans. The viewer witnesss the inspiring tales of the incredible lengths some humans will go to in order to give hope to these unfortunate beasts and explores the characters and personalities of both human and animal. Epsiodes highlight stories such as when Pen Farthing, a veteran of the war in Afghanistan, couldnt return with his companion dog and so he set up a shelter in Kabul that provides medical care for ex-servoice dogs; when animals need a prosthetic limb, Derrick Campana will desing one, even for an elephant; or when Animal Defenders International (ADI), try to introduce bans on circuses in Peru.

programme.title: Pet Nation Renovation
programme.desc: Led by animal expert Dave Salmoni, the Project Pawsitive team get to work renovating some of Americas favourite animal shelters. programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: Talking Movies
programme.desc: Join for the latest news from the world of film, including everything from documentaries to mainstream, indie and world cinema. The presenter travels all over the world, attending the greatest festivals and exclusive premieres, interviewing all the biggest stars, which over the years included big names such as Jude Law, Catherine Zeta Jones, Eathan Hawke, Ben Kingsley, Sally Hawkins and many others. The show also explores the newest trends and issues in the world of cinema.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. programme.title: The Media Show
programme.desc: How the AI avatar of a school-shooting victim was made - and interviewed.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Business Today
programme.desc: The latest business news from Singapore and around the world.

programme.desc: A round-up of the days sporting action.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: The Presidents Path
programme.desc: A weekly discussion on the US presidency.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Крест шантажирует польского бизнесмена Матейчука, чтобы выкупить его фирму. За несговорчивость Крест приказывает убить начальника охраны поляка. Но и сам не остается без проблем… расстреливают его "кошелька" Морозова. Расследование поручают Тарану и его варшавскому коллеге.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Тарану предлагают стать борцом с коррупцией, однако не с рядовыми служащими, а с высокими генеральскими чинами, кормящихся у криминальных "бизнесменов". Один из них – Крест. Тарану надо провернуть сделку с Крестом: показания в обмен на прощение грехов.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Зинкевич попадается на крючок со взяткой, за ним следит "наружка", чтобы выйти на заказчика. Однако его коллег настораживает, что Зинкевич не страхуется и не прячется от слежения. Появляется идея, что он связался с криминалом не по своей воле. В Варшаве считают, что к Кресту приедет киллер, и Таран попадает под подозрение.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Варшавский полицейский обыскивает номер Тарана, пытаясь найти доказательства того, что он – киллер. Однако Виктору удается вывести Креста на разговор. А коллеги Тарана в Киеве выясняют, что Зинкевич пошел на взяточничество из-за того, что похитили его дочь.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Несколько бомб заложено экстремистской группой защитников окружающей среды. У Группы Один есть только девяносто минут, чтобы предотвратить взрывы. В то время как Спайк обезвреживает одну бомбу, Лу случайно наступает на мину. Спайк любым способом пытается спасти своего друга. Но когда стало ясно, что любая попытка спасти его, скорее всего, приведет к смерти Спайка, Лу принёс себя в жертву.

programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: ГСР нужно защитить серийного убийцу, который признался в преступлениях и теперь возвращается в Канаду. Группа Один подвергается нападению, Сэм взят в заложники отцом жертвы, надеющимся совершить самосуд. Чтобы вызволить Сэма, Паркер просит оставить убийцу в руках агента, который, как оказалось тоже жаждет мести. Донна вынуждена стрелять в агента прежде, чем она убьет свою цель.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: На вечеринке "Трансгаза" был отравлен вице-президент компании. Раскрыть "щекотливое" дело берутся Никонов, Скребцов и Аня. Но что стало причиной трагедии: любовные связи или грязный бизнес?

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Таран находит 8 подозрительных смертей за последние несколько месяцев. Все погибшие – бизнесмены, продавшие свои компании за минимальную стоимость перед смертью. А скупщик дешевого бизнеса – старый знакомый Тарана, Крест.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: После неожиданной атаки Леона и его попытки убить преступника и друзей, Таран берет его и свою кровь для экспертизы. Он подозревает, что их кто-то отравил психотропными веществами. Результаты анализов действительно положительные, однако приглашенный профессионал уверен, что без дополнительных средств, например, гипноз, заставить людей убить невозможно.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: В городе происходит несколько нападений на инкассаторские машины. Налеты проводят дерзко, с убийствами. Дело дают в руки лучшего опера Киева Виктора Тарана, если он раскроет его, сможет претендовать на место начальника. А если банду не найдут в ближайшее время, то могут полететь головы вышестоящего начальства, так как обеспеченные влиятельные люди не любят терять свои деньги.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Оперативники находят машину, которую использовали грабители. Её владелец – алкоголик, который недавно отдал старое авто малознакомому парню. Один из бизнесменов, которому светит приговор, доносит генералу, кто меняет украденные из инкассаторских машин наличные. Если органы не захотят оказывать ему услугу, им придется объяснять прессе связь с крупными инвесторами, которые по стечению обстоятельств работают с менялами.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Раненый грабитель пытается самостоятельно вытянуть шар из ноги, затрагивает артерию и умирает. Милиция приезжает к нему на квартиру слишком поздно. Таран уверен, что последний налет организовал Таир, пытаясь отвести от себя подозрения. Но ни у одного из отделов никаких серьезных доказательств нет. Таран предлагает объединить свои усилия, чтобы найти убийц как можно скорее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Убийство двух оперативников, самоубийство подозреваемого и арест коллеги при попытке незаконно купить оружие – все это сваливается на Тарана за одну ночь. В квартире беглеца грабителя находят целый "арсенал", теперь операм становится неясно, зачем грабителям надо было нападать на участкового. Они начинают расследовать его возможной причастности к налетам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Таран узнает о покушении на преступника, который должен выйти из тюрьмы. Милиция организует подставного киллера, чтобы взять заказчика с поличным. Одновременно в городе скинхеды убивают молодого парня, главаря смельчаков, которые защищали приезжих чернокожих студентов.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Идейный парень стреляет в убийцу своего друга и прячется. Его начинают искать и милиция, и скинхеды. Компания расистов собирают на допрос, однако все они молчат и требуют адвокатов. Удается нажать только на одного парня, с условным сроком.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame well never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Welcome to the town of Jellystone - a charming place where your favorite Hanna-Barbera characters live, work and play together... but, at the same time, cant help but stir up trouble for one another. The animated series includes classic characters such as Yogi, Boo Boo, Snagglepuss, Adam Ant, Huckleberry Hound, Jabberjaw, Magilla Gorilla and more.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment.

programme.desc: Gumball sets out to solve the mystery of who stuffed Principal Brown into his locker. / Gumball and Darwins harmless pranks on Dad spiral hopelessly out of control. / Gumball and Darwins martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school. / Gumball is traumatised when accidentally kissed on the mouth by his Grandma JoJo. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party and have to bring a date! / Gumball and Darwin unsuccessfully attempt to get a refund for their computer game. / Gumball discovers that Bobert is planning to take over his identity and replace him! / Gumball and Darwin barely survive a school picnic in the Forest of Doom. / Gumball sets out to win his Dad back by winning a blindfolded "dumb" race.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the days biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Call to Earth
programme.desc: The programme focuses on the burning issue of environmental problems on our planet. It revolves around the tough challenges Earth faces nowadays, and aims to draw attention and wake people up in order to take some serious measures and choose mindful consumption.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: African Voices: Change makers is a CNN programme that focuses on some of Africas brightest and most brilliant change makers as they engineer innovative solutions or beneficial changes that will positively impact their communities. CNN is a constantly evolving and diversifying channel and African Voices is evidence of this new approach to news, utilising sources from across the globe. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

Everything what Africa is filled with and lives for is in this series.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Mike Brewers World of Cars
programme.desc: Car trader and vehicle fanatic Mike Brewer travels Britain and the United States looking for expert craftsmen in this automotive documentary series. He meets with diverse individuals who share his passion for finding, building, and most importantly, driving cars. Adding various pit stops to his jam-packed journey, including breweries, distilleries, and eateries, Mike gets stuck into the American way of life. Whether its learning more about the birth of NASCAR in Charlotte, North Carolina, meeting with the king of custom builds Gene Winfield, or seeing the work of British Motor Heritage who produce key components for Minis and MGs, each leg of his adventure is full of creative characters and superb cars.

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: To say expert British mechanic Ant Anstead is a lover of cars would be an understatement. The term petrol head does not quite cover the passion he exudes for motor vehicles. One of the vehicles that Ant has a particular obsession with is the 1930s Alfa Romeo 158 Grand Prix race car, one of the greatest racers ever made, which he is honouring in this documentary series by building his own from scratch. We follow Ant and his Alfa on their journey from workshop to race circuit, as he overcomes challenges, setbacks and deadlines to get this commemorative racer ready in time.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Shed and Buried
programme.desc: Motorbike enthusiast Henry Cole and expert Sam Lovegrove travel around the UK to explore peoples sheds searching for some automotive bargains. They purchase all kinds of old cars, bikes, jeeps, tractors and other vehicles in order to renovate them and sell after the rehabilitation work is over. The old vehicles are restored and given second life. It is a risky business and the two always wonder if they manage to make profit this time.

programme.title: Shed and Buried

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
