programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikla birojs kļūst par upuri izjokošanai, kā rezultātā cieš visi darbinieki.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Džena ieradusies Skrentonā, lai visām dāmām sniegtu lekciju par sievietēm darbavietā. Saskumis, ka viņš nevar piedalīties seminārā, Maikls visus vīriešus aizved uz noliktavu pavadīt laiku "puišu kompānijā".

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls devies uz Dunder Mifflin centrālo biroju Ņujorkā. Tur viņu un Dženu sagaida kas negaidīts. Tikmēr Skrentonā darbinieki svin Valentīndienu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls apmāca Dvaitu uzstāties - viņš nominēts kā gada labākais pārdevējs.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Bērni ieradušies Dunder Mifflin uz gadskārtējo bērnu dienu darbā. Maikls ir pārsteigts, labi satiekot ar Tobija meitu. Pema izmisīgi mēģina sadraudzēties ar kolēģa meitu, bet Raiens nokļūst zem Stenlija lupas.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks ieceļ Lizu par Endžijas pasākuma vadītāju, cerot, ka viņa spēs emocionāli manipulēt ar Endžiju, lai vērstos pie Treisija. "Jordānas karalienes" kameras rada Džekam zināmu apmulsumu, vienlaikus atstājot Džennu uzmanības badā. Frenka dzīvē atgriežas zaudēta mīlestība, liekot viņam apšaubīt savu briedumu.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Treisijs joprojām atrodas Āfrikā, tādēļ TGS turpina "piespiedu pārtraukumu", liekot ikvienam sākt kalt citus karjeras plānus. Džeks vēršas pie Devona Benksa, lai izkļūtu no problēmām ar Kebltaunas izpilddirektoru.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza un Kenets mēģina atrast, kur Ņujorkā slēpjas Treisijs, tā cenšoties glābt šovu. Dženna ir aizņemta ar šausmu filmas uzņemšanu Konektikutā, bet Pīts mēģina stāties pretī ļaundarīgam komandas loceklim.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Henks Hūpers draud pārtraukt "TGS", bet Džeks pārliecina viņu ļaut Lizai un kompānijai parādīt savu 100. sēriju. Lai radītu vislabāko iespējamo šovu, Lizai jātiek galā ar ne visai ideāliem darba apstākļiem. Gatavojoties izrādei, Džeks sāk šaubīties par svarīgu lēmumu savā dzīvē, bet Dženna apsver iespēju kļūt par māti.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Henks Hūpers draud pārtraukt "TGS", bet Džeks pārliecina viņu ļaut Lizai un kompānijai parādīt savu 100. sēriju. Lai radītu vislabāko iespējamo šovu, Lizai jātiek galā ar ne visai ideāliem darba apstākļiem. Gatavojoties izrādei, Džeks sāk šaubīties par svarīgu lēmumu savā dzīvē, bet Dženna apsver iespēju kļūt par māti.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ņujorkas pievārtē kādā senlaicīgā un baisā Steitenailendas mājā mitinās iedzīvotāji, kuru dzīve lielākoties sākas iestājoties tumsai. Nama stāvus apdzīvo trīs asinsūcēji vampīri – Nandors, Lazlo un Nadja –, enerģijas vampīrs Kolins Robinsons, kurš strādā birojā un ar savu nomācošo klātbūtni izsūc enerģiju saviem kolēģiem, un Giljermo, Nadīnas paziņa. Kā jau kārtīgi vampīri, viņi ir vairākus gadsimtus seni, un iekļaušanās mūsdienu pasaulē tiem nereti sagādā galvassāpes. Otrajā sezonā vampīriem būs jāsaskaras ar zombijiem, raganām, spokiem, slepkavām, interneta troļļiem un citiem mošķiem. Tikmēr Giljermo būs jāizšķiras, vai pašam kļūt par vampīru.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ņujorkas pievārtē kādā senlaicīgā un baisā Steitenailendas mājā mitinās iedzīvotāji, kuru dzīve lielākoties sākas iestājoties tumsai. programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri atriezušies no pasaules klejojumiem, lai savu māju atrastu uz sabrukšanas robežas, turklāt tajā iemitinājies jauns un baiss radījums.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrod draudzenei darbu netālu esošajā Grīnšovas folijā. Kad vairāki biedri tiek atrasti miruši, aizdomās tiek turēti visi, un neviens nevar iedomāties, kādus noslēpumus atklās Džeina.

programme.title: Nožēlojamie
programme.desc: Žans Valžāns ir nobažījies, kad Kozete satiek kādu jaunu vīrieti. Tenardjē plāno atriebību.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pārsteidzoša saikne ar kādu pazuduša cilvēka lietu liek no jauna paskatīties uz vietējiem iedzīvotājiem, tomēr, vai kāds no viņiem tiešām varētu būt izdarījis slepkavību?

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tantes briesmīgā pareģojuma Krebtrī pamet Efiju pie altāra. Viņš cer, ka šāds žests glābs viņas dzīvību, pat ja pašam ir salauzta sirds, tomēr viņa uzvedība pārsteidz Mērdoku.

programme.title: Nožēlojamie
programme.desc: Viktora Igo klasiskā darba adaptācija. Francija laikā pēc Napoleona kariem. Žans Valžāns izvairās no neatlaidīgā inspektora Žavēra.

programme.title: Nožēlojamie
programme.desc: Žans Valžāns ir nobažījies, kad Kozete satiek kādu jaunu vīrieti. Tenardjē plāno atriebību.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Šī ir nozīmīga diena Tristanam, taču sāpīgs noslēpums draud izjaukt svinības un Džeimsa centieni aizsargāt Helēnu no savām problēmām tikai pasliktina situāciju.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka Vaileta Hārta melo par sava tēva nāvi, Ogdenas novērojumi apstiprina viņa pieņēmumus.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Popzvaigzne un viņa rezerves dejotājs tiek nosisti ar elektrību, izpildot triku televīzijas mūzikas šovā, un Peregrīnas objektivitāte tiek pārbaudīta, kad viņas vecais draugs Ēriks tiek nosaukts par galveno aizdomās turamo šajā lietā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza dodas uz cietumu Londonas nomalē. Viņa un Hercogs pārmeklē šķietami tukšu ēku, tomēr izrādās, ka tur slēpjas banda.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam ir jānokārto veci rēķini, kad Daroubijā atgriežas pazīstama seja, un Tristanam un Zigfrīdam ir jāatzīst savstarpējās atšķirības.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Krebtrī un Brekenrīds apmeklē greznu literatūras pasākumu, policistu atraida bijusī protežē Lūsija Moda Montgomerija, bet inspektoru noraida slavenais Rudjards Kiplings.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Burleska šovs aizrauj skatītājus Vailetas salonā, un Higinss un citi policisti plāno to apmeklēt. Tomēr, kad tuvumā tiek atrasts miris kāds viesis, izmeklēšana noved pie negaidītas atkalredzēšanās.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrod draudzenei darbu netālu esošajā Grīnšovas folijā. Kad vairāki biedri tiek atrasti miruši, aizdomās tiek turēti visi, un neviens nevar iedomāties, kādus noslēpumus atklās Džeina.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Tesa no dErbervilu cilts
programme.desc: Pēc traumatiskas tikšanās ar manipulatīvo Aleksu nabadzīgā Tesa mēģina atjaunot līdzsvaru savā dzīvē un iemīlas ideālistā Endželā. Kad par sevi atgādina pagātne, šīs jūtas tiek atklātas.

programme.title: Premier League. West Ham United - Chelsea
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Night Class
programme.desc: When Jake, a security guard in a small hotel, inadvertently helps out a beautiful burglar, he becomes a primary suspect and is quickly fired. Jake decides to track down the burglar himself and retrieve the stolen property.

programme.title: The 51st State
programme.desc: An American master chemist plans to score big on a once in a lifetime drug deal. All does not go as planned and he is soon entangled in a web of deceit.

programme.title: Shoreditch
programme.desc: Set both on the eve of World War II in a shady Shoreditch nightclub and in present-day London. Thirtysomething Tom tries to solve a murder that was committed in the club decades before.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Copper Jack Stone purposefully orchestrates a bank robbery in order to be thrown into prison with the notorious Russian kingpin Balam. Balam is more than just a mob criminal; hes a very cunning and dangerous lord who controls the police force from behind bars. Balam lives in prison as a cover for his real power, which is King of the city. His cell is a lavish private room built specifically for him, inaccessible to most in the depths of the prison structure. Even the warden fears venturing into his area of the prison. However, even surrounded by his loyal henchmen and guards in his sectioned off fortress, Balam doesnt know Jack is coming for him to avenge his family, who Balam murdered in cold blood. Balam is tough... but Jack is tougher.

programme.title: Diamond Dogs
programme.desc: A mercenary is hired to protect an expedition group while they search for a Buddhist tapestry worth millions of dollars. However, as they descend deeper into the jungle, more and more members mysteriously vanish.

programme.title: Get the Girl
programme.desc: Calvin Jones works at a boring and whimsical office job while searching for meaning to his life and decides that means winning the affections of the office hottie Britney. Calvin struggles mightily to capture the true words to express his feelings, but can not.

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction
programme.desc: Lives spiral out of control when four friends cover up a murder.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: Answer Me
programme.desc: A drama from 2004 produced in Italy, the script of which was based on the novel by Susanna Tamaro. A couple in love gets married, but when their first-born son comes to the world, the life of a young couple turns into hell.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: The Flock
programme.desc: This film is about a hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety who, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl who he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

programme.title: Crown Vic
programme.desc: Follows one memorable night in the life of LAPD officer Ray Mandel while hunting two cop killers on the loose.

programme.title: The Girls of Summer
programme.desc: The story of Jake McBride, "The best softball player in his league," who bets his best friend he can win the league with a team of models. Together, Jake and his model cousin Holly recruit an athletic group of pampered princesses and attempt to turn them into a well-oiled softball playing machine.

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Copper Jack Stone purposefully orchestrates a bank robbery in order to be thrown into prison with the notorious Russian kingpin Balam. Balam is more than just a mob criminal; hes a very cunning and dangerous lord who controls the police force from behind bars. Balam lives in prison as a cover for his real power, which is King of the city. His cell is a lavish private room built specifically for him, inaccessible to most in the depths of the prison structure. Even the warden fears venturing into his area of the prison. However, even surrounded by his loyal henchmen and guards in his sectioned off fortress, Balam doesnt know Jack is coming for him to avenge his family, who Balam murdered in cold blood. Balam is tough... but Jack is tougher.

programme.title: Naudas monstrs
programme.desc: Finanšu raidījumu vadītājs Lī Geits un viņa producente Petija nonāk ekstrēmā situācijā - kāds investors viņus un viņu komandu paņem gūstā.

programme.title: Spoža talanta nepanesamais smagums

programme.title: La La Land. Kalifornijas sapņi
programme.desc: Mia ir topošā aktrise, kas piestrādā kafejnīcā, pasniedzot latte kafijas filmu zvaigznēm. Viņas mīļotais ir Sebastians, džeza mūziķis, kas mēģina savilkt galus, uzstājoties ar koncertiem šaubīgos un noplukušos bāros. Panākumiem pieaugot, jaunais mīlnieku pāris saskaras ar lēmumiem, kas sāk graut viņu mīlestību. Sapņi, pie kuriem viņi strādājuši tik smagi, nu viņus var izšķirt!

programme.title: Grūtie laiki viesnīcā "El Royale"
programme.desc: 1969. gads. Viesnīcā "El Royale" ir apmetusies ļoti raiba kompānija - nīgrs mācītājs, dziedātāja, enerģisks putekļu sūcēju pārdevējs un arī aizdomīga meiča no Dienvidiem. Katram no viņiem ir savi noslēpumi un katram būs iespēja izpirkt savus pagātnes grēkus.

programme.title: Trakā, dullā mīlestība
programme.desc: Kals Vīvers ir veiksminieks - viņam ir lielisks darbs, sapņu māja, jauki bērni un mīļotā sieva, ar kuru viņš iepazinās jau vidusskolā. Tomēr, kad Kals uzzina, ka sieva viņu krāpj un pieprasa šķiršanos, viņa ideālā dzīve mainās līdz nepazīšanai.

programme.title: Psihoanalīze gangsteru gaumē
programme.desc: Profesionālam psihoterapeitam jāatrod risinājums - kā palīdzēt gangsterim - cilvēkam, kurš visas savas problēmas risina ar ieroču palīdzību. Kristals spēlē psihoterapeitu Benu Solelu, kurš no tā vien dzīvo, ka mēģina atrisināt Vitti emocionālo krīzi un atgriezt viņu pilnvērtīgai gangstera dzīvei. Jā, Sobels ir ģimenes ārsts, tikai tā nav parasta ģimene, kurā viņš nokļuvis.

programme.title: Idiokrātija
programme.desc: Iepazīstieties ar Džo Baueru. Viņu gan nevar uzskatīt par izcilību, taču, kad valdības īpašais eksperiments ar iesaldēšanu izgāžas, viņš nonāk tālajā 2505. gadā. Sabiedrība ir degradējusies. To vada pilnīgs komerciālisms un trula televīzijas programma, un Džo kļūst par gudrāko cilvēku uz planētas. Tagad viduvējā Džo ziņā ir iegriezt cilvēces evolūciju pareizajās sliedēs!

programme.title: Kā tikt pie vedēja?
programme.desc: Divas nedēļas pirms savām kāzām sociāli distancēts puisis iesaistās šarādēs, noalgojot uzņēmumu, kas līgavaiņiem nodrošina atbalsta komandu un vedējus.

programme.title: Neticamais stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir F. Skota Ficdžeralda stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu, kurš piedzimis sirmā vecumā un laika gaitā paliek aizvien jaunāks. Neparastie notikumi aizsākas Pirmā pasaules kara beigās, Ņūorleānā un sniedzas līdz 21. gadsimtam - tas ir stāsts par cilvēku, kurš tāpat kā mēs visi, nespēj ietekmēt laika ritējumu un viņa dzīve ir tikpat neparasta, cik tā var būt jebkuram no mums.

programme.title: Kā debesīs
programme.desc: Kādā fermā 19. gadsimta beigās aizsākas intensīva gaidīšana - mātei sākas sarežģītas dzemdības, un 14 gadus vecajai Līzei ir jāsagatavojas naktij, kas varētu mainīt viņas dzīvi uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Kolibri
programme.desc: Filma par galvenā varoņa vīrieša dzīvi no 1970. gadiem līdz tuvākajai nākotnei un neskaitāmāām attiecībām, kas bijušas viņa ceļā.

programme.title: Neticamais stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir F. Skota Ficdžeralda stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu, kurš piedzimis sirmā vecumā un laika gaitā paliek aizvien jaunāks. Neparastie notikumi aizsākas Pirmā pasaules kara beigās, Ņūorleānā un sniedzas līdz 21. gadsimtam - tas ir stāsts par cilvēku, kurš tāpat kā mēs visi, nespēj ietekmēt laika ritējumu un viņa dzīve ir tikpat neparasta, cik tā var būt jebkuram no mums.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Food Truck Showdown. Robert competes against three of the best food trucks in North Carolina. The mission is to prepare enough food for 500 people and use beer in every dish.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: Jesse Palmer challenges the bakers to create road trip portable desserts. Then, the bakers go glamping with glam summer cobblers.

programme.title: Chopped

The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: Duff Goldmans team and Ashley Holts team battle to make cakes inspired by their best meal ever and featuring hyper realistic food.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: For this challenge, Duff Goldmans squad and Timbo Sullivans team create cakes that feature dazzling architectural detail, both inside and outside.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Abigeila
programme.desc: Ļaundaru grupa nolaupa ietekmīga noziedzīgās pasaules pārstāvja 12 gadus veco meitu baletdejotāju. Viņu mērķis ir paturēt meiteni ieslodzījumā uz vienu nakti, lai tiktu pie 50 miljonu dolāru lielas izpirkuma maksas. Taču mājā, kurā viņi ir apmetušies, notiek savādas lietas - cits pēc cita pazūd nolaupītāji, un ar pieaugošām šausmām viņi atklāj, ka ir ieslēgti kopā ar kādu, kas nav tipiska maza meitenīte.

programme.title: Maja Ma
programme.desc: Pallavi Patela ir indiešu vidusmēra ģimenes sieva, pazīstama ar savu dejotprasmi un kulinārijas mākslu. Dēla Teja saderināšanās vakars draud izgāzties, jo paklīdušas tenkas par priekšzīmīgo mājsaimnieci Pallavi.

programme.title: Neatrodamā
programme.desc: Piektajā kāzu gadadienā Niks Danns ziņo policijai par savas sievas Eimijas pazušanu. Izmeklētāju spiediena un mediju arvien pieaugošās intereses dēļ Nika stāsts par laimīgo pāri sāk izirt. Drīz vien viņa meli, krāpšanās un savādā uzvedība liek visiem uzdot vienu jautājumu: vai Niks Danns nogalināja savu sievu? Filmas pamatā ir "New York Times" betselleru autores Džilianas Flinnas darbs.

programme.title: Ugunīgi ass
programme.desc: Iedvesmojošs stāsts par Ričardu Montaņezu, uzkodu ražotāja "Frito Lay" apkopēju, kurš, pateicoties savai meksikāņu izcelsmei, sapurināja pārtikas industriju, palīdzot radīt vienus no visu laiku populārākajiem čipsiem "Flamin Hot Cheetos".

programme.title: 200 % vilks
programme.desc: Kad Freda Lupina vēlēšanās piepildās ne tā, kā viņš to paredzējis, vilciņš pārvēršas par vilkati un uz Zemes nonāk palaidnīgs Mēness gariņš. Nu Fredijam jādara viss, lai atjaunotu kosmisko kārtību, pirms Zeme sadursies ar Mēnesi.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Ričards ir jauns zvirbulēns, kuru savā lokā pieņēmusi stārķu ģimene. Viņš pavada ziemu Āfrikas ziemeļos, taču ir pienācis laiks atgriezties mājās. Ričards vēlas vadīt gājputnu kāsi, bet šim uzdevumam tiek izraudzīts viņa pusbrālis Makss. Jaunais putnēns jūtas aizvainots, taču drīz sākas vētrains piedzīvojums. Tirāniskais pāvs Zamano sagūsta Ričarda draugu. Zamano atsakās viņu laist brīvībā, kamēr Ričards neatrisinās mīklu un neatradīs Zamano dārgakmeni.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Singstrīta
programme.desc: Dublina, 1985. gads. Ekonomiskā krīze Īrijā arvien vairāk cilvēku iedzen bankrotā, tikmēr 15 gadus vecais Konors kopā ar brāli un māsu dzīvo pie vecākiem, kuru laulībai draud izjukšana. Lai ietaupītu naudu, Konoram nākas mainīt skolu. Tur viņš ātri vien kļūst par izstumto. Kādu dienu viņš pamana Rafīnu, kura šad tad stāv iepretim skolai, raudzīdamās tālumā un smēķēdama vienu cigareti pēc otras. Viņa ir skaista, divus gadus vecāka par Konoru, viņai ir draugs, un viņa strādā par modeli. Īsāk sakot: viņa ir gandrīz nesasniedzama. Taču Konors nav gatavs padoties un piedāvā meitenei piedalīties viņa grupas videoklipā. Rafīna piekrīt, un Konors ir panikā, jo grupas viņam nemaz nav...

programme.title: Everests
programme.desc: 1996. gada 10. maija rītā divas alpīnistu komandas uzsāk pēdējo posmu ceļā uz Everestu, kas ir pasaules augstākā virsotne. Piepeši kalnu grēdu pārņem negaiss, un piedzīvojumu meklētājiem ceļu aizšķērso cilvēces vēsturē spēcīgākā sniega vētra. Šajos skarbajos apstākļos komandām ir jāiztur stindzinoši brāzmains vējš un mežonīgs aukstums, lai izdzīvotu gandrīz neiespējamā situācijā.

programme.title: Zīmes
programme.desc: Pensilvānijas štatā kopā ar diviem bērniem un brāli Merilinu pavisam mierīgi, neviena netraucēts, dzīvo fermeris Greiems Hess. Taču šo mieru pārtrauc dīvaini notikumi – vispirms kukurūzas laukos parādās gigantiski apļi, un, iespējams, tos tiešām ir radījušas ārpuszemes civilizācijas. Tad ar viņa tuviniekiem sāk notikt dīvainas lietas. Greiemem ir jātiek skaidrībā ar notiekošo, pirms viņa pasaule nav sabrukusi pavisam.

programme.title: Ella un melnais Jaguārs
programme.desc: Pēc daudziem gadiem, kas pavadīti Ņujorkā, 14 gadus vecā Ella atgriežas Amazones lietus mežā, lai glābtu savu bērnības ciematu un mīļoto jaguāru draugu.

programme.title: Lī
programme.desc: Patiesais stāsts par fotogrāfi Elizabeti "Lī" Milleri, modes modeli, kura kļuva par atzītu kara korespondenti Vogue žurnālam Otrā pasaules kara laikā.

programme.title: Putncilvēks
programme.desc: Strauji novecojis, slavas norietā esošs aktieris, kurš reiz atveidoja pasaulē slavenu supervaroni, cīnās ar ģimenes likstām, paša egoismu un citiem šķēršļiem, cenšoties izveidot Brodvejas izrādi, no kuras atkarīga viņa turpmākā karjera un, iespējams, arī dzīve. Mākslas filma ieguva septiņas "Zelta globusa" nominācijas, no kurām saņēma divas – kategorijās "Labākais aktieris mūziklā vai komēdijā" un "Labākais scenārijs", tāpat filma saņēma arī deviņas "Oskara" nominācijas, no kurām balvu saņēma četrās kategorijās. Rigana lomas atveidotājs Maikls Kītons vienu no slavenākajām lomām atveidoja asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filmā "Betmens" (1989). Filmas režisors ir Meksikā dzimušais Alehandro Gonzalezs Injaritu, kurš pazīstams ar filmām "Mīla kuce" (2000), "21 grams" (2003), "Bābele" (2006) un "Biutiful" (2010). Injaritu filmas ir mākslinieciski augstvērtīgi un sarežģīti "juveliera darbi"; sadarbību ar režisoru slavējuši vairāki augstas raudzes Holivudas aktieri, tostarp Šons Pens, Naomi Votsa, Benisio del Toro, Breds Pits, Keita Blanšeta, Havjers Bardems.

programme.title: Nozust 60 sekundēs
programme.desc: Cik daudz var paveikt 60 sekundēs? Izsmēķēt cigareti vai izdzert tasīti kafijas. Taču tikai viens profesionālis pasaulē –leģendārais zaglis Memfiss – dažu sekunžu laikā spēj aizdzīt jebkuru automobili. Šoreiz gan viņam nāksies paveikt burtiski neiespējamo. Lai glābtu savu brāli, Memfisam vienas nakts laikā jānolaupa 50 pirmklasīgas mašīnas. Lai izkļūtu no mafijas un policijas dubultslazda, viņam jāievēro tikai viens princips - nedrīkst apstāties...

programme.title: Nevainīgā
programme.desc: Cecīlija, ārkārtīgi ticīga sieviete, tiek laipni uzņemta gleznainā Itālijas ainavā esošā klosterī. Taču Cecīlijai drīz vien kļūst skaidrs, ka viņas jaunās mājas slēpj tumšus un šausminošus noslēpumus.

programme.title: Bildinājums
programme.desc: Ambiciozā Ņujorkas izdevniecības vadītāja Margareta ir gatavā vellata, un viņas darbinieki visi kā viens dabū no bargās priekšnieces trūkties. Īpaši smagi klājas asistentam Endrjū, kuram Margaretas dēļ nākas strādāt pat brīvdienās. Taču kādu dienu nevainojamajai Margaretas dzīvei rodas nopietns apdraudējums – uzturēšanās atļauja ASV ir beigusies, un viņai draud deportācija uz dzimto Kanādu. Lai nepazaudētu prestižo darbu, viņai atliek tikai viena iespēja – likt kādam no saviem padotajiem viņu bildināt un noslēgt fiktīvas laulības. Pirmais Margaretas ceļā trāpās Endrjū.

programme.title: 10 dzīvības
programme.desc: Lutināts kaķis Bekets par pašsaprotamu uzskata laimīgo lozi, kas viņam iedalīta, kopš viņu izglāba un iemīlēja Roza, labsirdīga un aizrautīga studente. Kad kaķis zaudē savu devīto dzīvību, liktenis iejaucas, lai viņu aizvestu pārmācošā piedzīvojumā.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Rūķi
programme.desc: Hloja un viņas mamma pārvācas – jau ATKAL! Turklāt viņas pārvācas uz necilu, vecu māju, kas pilna ar dārza rūķiem. Drīz Hloja gan atklāj, ka šī māja slēpj biedējošu noslēpumu. Kādu dienu pēc skolas Hloja kopā ar kaimiņu Liamu atklāj, ka rūķi patiesībā ir dzīvi! Kā izrādās, jau gadiem rūķi ir sargājuši planētu no draudīgiem maziem monstriem, kuri iebrukuši mājā caur portālu, kas ved uz citu pasauli. Kad vienīgais līdzeklis, kas varētu palīdzēt uzveikt monstrus, skolā nonāk nepareizajās rokās, Hlojai un Liamam jāsadarbojas ar rūķiem, lai cīnītos pret mazo negantnieku iebrukumu un glābtu pasauli!

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Jauns policists uzņemas veikt slepenu operāciju un iefiltrējas sacīkšu braucēju komandā, lai izmeklētu dārglietu laupīšanu. Vispirms cenšoties iekarot komandas vadoņu uzticību, viņš nonāk briesmās, un pārējos komandas locekļos mostas aizdomas par viltvārdi viņu rindās. Sadursme ir neizbēgama.

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas Bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā Bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīsta mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Bitīte Maija ir patīkami satraukta, jo tuvojas slavenās Medus spēles. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai? Taču bitītes satraukums izgaist, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju stropam piedalīties spēlēs.

programme.title: Karš par Pērtiķu planētu
programme.desc: Pērtiķu līderis Cēzars saskaras ar personīgu pārbaudījumu, jo viņam uzbrukušie cilvēku karavīri, kurus vada cietsirdīgais Pulkvedis, nogalina viņa tuviniekus. Cēzars ar savu inteliģento pērtiķu armiju stājas pretim cilvēkiem, kuri iznīcina viņu ģimenes. Ar primitīviem ieročiem bruņotās abu sugu armijas tiksies cīņā, kuras laikā tiks izlemts, kura suga kontrolēs Zemi nākotnē.

programme.title: Dzeguze
programme.desc: Septiņpadsmitgadniece Grēthena spiesta pārcelties kopā ar ģimeni uz vietu, kur nekas nav tā, kā izskatās.

programme.title: Kingsman: Slepenais dienests
programme.desc: Režisora Metjū Vona filma "Kingsman: Slepenais dienests", kuras pamatā ir godalgots komikss, vēsta par īpaši slepenu spiegu organizāciju, kas rekrutē savā nežēlīgas konkurences apmācību programmā neprasmīgu, taču daudzsološu ielaspuiku, jo pasauli apdraud jucis tehnoloģiju ģēnijs.

programme.title: Baltais puisis Riks
programme.desc: Riks Verše ir vientuļais tēvs, kurš nemitīgi cīnās, lai uzaudzinātu divus pusaudžus Detroitā pagājušā gadsimta 80. gados – laikā, kad tur valda narkotiku bums. Verše nelegāli tirgo ieročus, tā mēģinot savilkt kopā galus, taču drīz vien viņam pievērš uzmanību FIB. Federālie aģenti pārliecina Veršes dēlu Riku Junioru kļūt par narkotiku aģentu, pretī saņemot tēva brīvību. Kad jaunais Riks spēlē ieslīgst pārlieku dziļi, viņš pats kļūst par narkotiku dīleri.

programme.title: Bladšots
programme.desc: Rejs reiz dzīvoja pavisam citādu dzīvi - līdz nomira. Atguvies uz operāciju galda, viņš neatceras nedz to, kas viņš ir, nedz kur atrodas un kā šeit nokļuvis. Izrādās, iepriekšējā dzīvē Rejs ir bijis jūras kājnieks, kas gājis bojā kaujas laikā. Nu viņš ir pasaulē pirmais cilvēks, kas augšāmcelts no mirušajiem. Atpakaļ dzīvē viņu atgriezusi vistalantīgāko zinātnieku komanda, izmantojot jaunākās nano un biotehnoloģijas. Viņa organismā ievadītie mikroskopiskie nanoroboti vīrieti ir pataisījuši par supercilvēku, biotehnoloģiju brīnumu - viņš pats spēj sevi izārstēt un ir tikpat kā neiznīcināms. Tomēr viņš sāk atcerēties savu iepriekšējo dzīvi, savu nogalināto sievu un viņas slepkavas un grasās atriebties. Taču vai uz šīm atmiņām var paļauties? Vai atriebes kāre ir viņa paša jūtas?

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Espanyol - Atletico Madrid
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. programme.title: Vīriešu pārbaudes spēle basketbolā .. Grieķija - Latvija
Futbols: Bundesliga. Bayern - Leipzig
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: UFC. Fight Night: Johnny Walker vs Zhang Mingyang
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

Futbols: Superkauss. Bayern - Stuttgart. "VfB Stuttgart" - Minhenes "Bayern"
Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The kids want to finish their bedrooms, but Chase needs to rally to get basement walls demoed and a new floor poured on time for a future family room.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn purchase a house in Manoa with a mould-infested room and major roof damage, and they must take on a second flip to cover the cost.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Caribbean Life

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Tiny Luxury
programme.desc: Husband and wife Tyson and Michelle Spiess are founders of Tiny Heirloom, a unique building company focussing on the construction of tiny, luxury homes. In this reality series we follow them as they construct homes under 400 square feet (37 square metres) into glorious, high-end, miniature mansions, showing that downsizing doesnt have to compromise comfort and style. Based in Portland, Oregon, the family run company helps customers fulfill their real estate dreams, squeezing every wish and request into these tiny homes, allowing them to enjoy every aspect of their new, pint-sized properties.

programme.title: The Nate And Jeremiah Home Project
programme.desc: A pair of first-time homeowners traded in their tiny rental for a roomier home, but they lack storage space. Nate and Jeremiah help transform it.

programme.title: The Nate And Jeremiah Home Project
programme.desc: A man bought his mother a home to thank her for her help, but her charming 1920s property needs an update. Nate and Jeremiah create a show-stopping kitchen.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Maya and Lon call on Jennifer to revamp their outdated home. She plans to give the property a Cape Cod style with all new cabinetry and countertops.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: A couple asks Jenn to revitalize their outdated home which contains, the most unusual bathroom shes ever seen. Jenn works with a family whose home has lots of space but no personality

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: The seven-episode series follows Carmine, a real estate agent and interior designer, and Mike, a landscape designer, as they each pitch their design plans to clients. programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Vacation House for Free is a reality TV show hosted by Matt Blashaw, real estate expert and licensed contractor with fantastic handyman skills he gained while working at his fathers lumberyard through college. Matt makes dreams come true for those who want to buy a vacation house and be mortgage free, he teaches them how to use rental income to cover the costs of owning it. Matt finds a property at a right price, renovates it and places it on the rental market. So his clients can get income when not living there and by doing so they get it for free.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The patriotic pals will call on trusted experts to help lay down the law for good deals. Between the events, Chum and Corey get carried away in a massive mansion, and Rick considers a million-dollar memento from a pivotal piece of Americas past.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. The crews must first win the right to ship the items by bidding on uShip, an online auction house that is one of the largest of its kind in the world. Once they have won the contract, they prepare the items for shipping, which is often easier said than done. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: What is the mysterious sea beast seen from the shore of a small seaside town in the UK? Are summoners able to commune with UFOs? Were a field of massive mysterious jars made by giants? And the ground seems to be breathing - is the earth alive?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey and Chum are going to the Deep South, as they head to Savannah, Georgia. The trio will be enchanted by a dangerous magic trick, a spooky hotel, and an infamous gravestone, as they wheel and deal in the most haunted city in America.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the days championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criterias, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. The crews must first win the right to ship the items by bidding on uShip, an online auction house that is one of the largest of its kind in the world. Once they have won the contract, they prepare the items for shipping, which is often easier said than done. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

programme.desc: Based solely on Charles Darwins Theory of Evolution, the rapid development of modern humans seems impossible without a "missing link." Could this link involve extraterrestrial intervention?

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: Weve been fascinated by our nearest planetary neighbor, Venus. Its about the same size as our world, covered in massive volcanoes and poisonous clouds of acid rain. Is Venus our evil twin or a warning about what Earth will become in the future?

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Goliath Grouper is a monster fish that inhabits the tropical shallow waters of Florida and the Caribbean. In 1895, the New York Times reported on a monster grouper that measured in at over fifteen-hundred pounds.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In different parts of the world there are eyewitnesses who claim they saw various mythical, strange and even scary creatures, from vampires and ghosts to different types of monsters. These individuals tell their stories while a team of experts and scientists use any available evidence to try to find explanations for these unusual sightings.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact.
